medium: Cotton, metal tape and sequins, silk
title: Baby Carrier
description: blue lining; lower panel fully embroidered in braid and outline technique in scroll patterns in maroon, red, green, black; center rectangle and other sections are divided by woven embroidered bands; upper panel is black satin with elaborate floral embroidery surrounding center circle; red, green, maroon, orange, purple with wrapped metal outlining, metal tape and sequins; bordered on three sides by wide woven embroidered band in red
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
